name: Flying Car Shooting Battle
description:
Indulge yourself in an epic and inescapable military air combat with racing Car Dogfight Battle. To master the art of Dogfight Car Racing Simulation you have to utilize your jet flying skills while attacking your Enemies. In Smashy Dogfight Titans Battle, different type of aircraft such as: F16 Mirage, MIG21, M1G25 Eagle, F-15, F22, SU35, Raptor, Typhoon, Rafal are replaced by Gotham turbo diesel engine with eight barreled 2, Gatling machine Guns, Hardy supercharged engine eight barreled 2, Gatling machine Guns Lynch turbo charged super engine with eight barreled 3, Gatling machine Guns Westo V8 engine with eight barreled 1 and Gatling machine gun.
The Enemy has a Digital plan to invade your country, as they have launched a massive assault through the airspace. The Survival of your country now is in your hands, rise above the occasion and save the day. Your job is to Protect your Country from the Deadly attack, by killing each of your Enemy one by one. Finish off your Enemies in aerial combat and make your country Proud.
You might have played games of dogfight involving air fighter and a jet fighter, but this game based on the concept of Racing Car Dogfight Battle will take your imagination to the whole new level. Fasten your Seat Belts for the ultimate Dogfight Battle of Titans. This game has input the Extraordinary focus on visual effect and detailing, which includes weapons, fire, explosion and on overall gameplay to make Dogfight Car Racing Simulation as realistic as any jet fighting game.
How to play:
- Tilt device to turn left and right to move flying fighter car.
- Tap on wallets icon to fire wallets Present right bottom of your phone screen.
- Tap camera icon to change view Present at the top of your device.
-Tap On guided missile to fire a guided missile on Enemy fighter cars.
- Tap on missile icon to fire Missiles button is provided just above fire button.
- Tap on calibrate icon to calibrate

features:
- Top free offline aircraft battle shooting as well as the Chasing game.
- Excellent fighter car physics implemented.
- Realistic 3d graphics with dynamic Lighting and amazing destruction effects.
- Multiple advanced fighter cars.
- Brutal Action now on your smart mobiles.
- User-friendly GUI and controls.
- Real Military Environment Looks like real movies related to air force war.
- Good quality sound effects.
- Efficient Weapon controls & movement.
